title: About
text:
I am currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Statistics and Data Science at the University of California, Los Angeles. I have held internships focusing on data analysis and quantitative finance. Iâ€™m passionate about applying statistical techniques to real-world problems and exploring the power of machine learning in finance.



UCLA (Sep 2023 - May 2025), B.S. in Statistics and Data Science
Mt. San Antonio College (Aug 2022 - May 2023), Major in Business
UC Riverside (Sep 2021 - May 2022), Major in Business





Python
Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint)
Statistical Analysis
Data Visualization (Plotly)

title: Projects
text:
Here are some highlights of my work and research experience.



Extracted and analyzed financial data from multiple APIs (Yahoo Finance, Tushare, FRED).
Created Python scripts to identify potential investment opportunities using daily ETF prices and technical indicators.
Visualized data insights with Plotly to improve the accuracy of investment decision-making.





Analyzed customer usage data to identify trends and patterns for targeted promotions.
Prepared detailed reports on network performance metrics using statistical methods.





Analyzed monthly income and expenses to identify inefficiencies and implement cost-saving measures.
Maintained strong relationships with clients, increasing retention and revenue.

title: Home
text:
Welcome



Profile Picture


Hello! My name is Boqian Mao. Welcome to my personal website.

I am a student at UCLA majoring in Statistics and Data Science.
I have experience in data analysis, quantitative finance, and more.
Check out my Projects or learn About Me.
